duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify suitable partners and suppliers for technology solutions and manage the execution of capital projects for implementation.
Engage external partners to accelerate adoption and deployment of new technology and provide specific recommendations for automation solutions.
Play a key role in determining existing automation capabilities and future opportunities, and create detailed project road maps for process improvement projects.
Recommend capital expenditures to improve the processes and be responsible for tracking product cost against standards.
Drive Operational Excellence within the manufacturing organization and lead collaborative discussions between leadership and key machine builders.
Support the Engineering Team by leading continuous improvement projects to improve operational efficiencies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Mechanical Engineering / Manufacturing Engineering / Computer Science with at least 5 years of experience working in customized high speed automation facilities.
